address.address_2: BAC Funding Corporation, Annex Building, Room A14

organization.description:
AIDS and health and wellness ministry that educates the public about HIV/AIDS, sexually transmitted diseases (STD's), tuberculosis (TB), and other life-challenging illnesses. A person does not have to be HIV+ to attend. It educates on harm reduction and syringe exchange in partnership with the University of Miami School of Medicine. Provides information and referral and notary public services. Spiritual counseling in a nonjudgmental manner is available as well. 

The AIDS ministry meets on every Thursday.
organization.name: FLASHLIGHT OF HOPE, INC.
